meanings.definition: A person who intends or plans to do something.
meanings.sent1: The intenders of the project gathered to discuss their plans.
meanings.sent2: The intenders of the marathon trained hard to reach their goal.
meanings.sent3: The intenders of the surprise party tried to keep it a secret.
meanings.sent4: The intenders of the treasure hunt searched eagerly for the hidden prize.
meanings.sent5: The intenders of the new club were excited to start their activities.

meanings.definition: Those who have a specific purpose or goal in mind.
meanings.sent1: The intenders of the mission knew exactly what they needed to accomplish.
meanings.sent2: The intenders of the meeting arrived early to set up the agenda.
meanings.sent3: The intenders of the picnic packed delicious food for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: The intenders of the competition practiced diligently to win the prize.
meanings.sent5: The intenders of the road trip planned the route carefully to visit all the landmarks.
